title: Looking to trade T206 Chase Sov. 460 for Chase with different back
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking to trade T206 Chase Sov. 460 for Chase with different back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
I am working on a T206 backs lineup (including the 5 Chase cards) and now have two different Chase cards with the same back.
I would like to trade either my Black Cap SGC 50 or Trophy Chase PSA 4 with Sov. 460 backs for the same pose, but with a back that I don't have.  I am looking for SGC 40-50's and can take or toss in some cash depending on the scarcity of your back and grade.
Let me know if you have any interest and we can discuss.
Thanks,
Bob
upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com
